title: Transfering account on new client
body: So I noticed the new client doesn't have any options to transfer my account to another server. Will this be added at some point?

replies.body:
Double check the [**Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)! 

[**Server transfers are currently disabled**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown).
